solution_line_template: Her hair needs to be {total_length_needed} inches long when she cuts it because {donation_length} + {desired_length_after_donation} = <<{donation_length}+{desired_length_after_donation}={total_length_needed}>>{total_length_needed}
She needs to grow it {length_to_grow} more inches because {total_length_needed} - {current_length} = <<{total_length_needed}-{current_length}={length_to_grow}>>{length_to_grow}
